defaultCourse1.title: Introduction to Informatics
defaultCourse1.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks foundational coverage in concurrent programming, distributed applications, and independent programming language learning.

defaultCourse2.title: Fundamentals of Programming (Exercises & Laboratory)
defaultCourse2.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course mainly lacks advanced concepts of object-oriented programming and concurrency.

defaultCourse3.title: Introduction to Computer Organization and Technology - Computer Architecture
defaultCourse3.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks comprehensive coverage on modern computer architecture and layered machine concepts.

defaultCourse4.title: Introduction to Software Engineering
defaultCourse4.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks depth in testing, configuration management, and software maintenance.

defaultCourse5.title: Operating Systems and System Software
defaultCourse5.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks detailed analysis of synchronization models, compilation transition processes, and concurrency management.

defaultCourse6.title: Fundamentals of Algorithms and Data Structures
defaultCourse6.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks advanced analysis of data compression, graph algorithms, and pattern matching.

defaultCourse7.title: Fundamentals of Databases
defaultCourse7.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks detailed study in database optimization and XML data modeling.

defaultCourse8.title: Computer Networking and IT Security
defaultCourse8.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course primarily lacks coverage of IT security protocols and intrusion detection methodologies.

defaultCourse9.title: Information Theory and Theoretical Informatics
defaultCourse9.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks content on advanced computational complexity and specific context-sensitive languages.

defaultCourse15.explanation_recommendation: The applicant's course lacks detailed coverage on eigenvalues and complex vector space analysis.
